channel.title: not so convenient on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in not so convenient on Barefoot Rob

item.title: my new favorite conveni is closing
item.description: 17:01 Tuesday 20 February 2018 JST Upon arrival at the convenience store near men’s group which features a counter featuring electrical outlets, I noticed a suspicious lack of inventory on the shelves. The guy at the register said they are closing next week (at 7am on Tuesday) and he didn’t know if it would ever reopen. Even worse, we are the threat.
